article_title: Three Idaho hospitals to be docked Medicare pay for low performance in patient safety
article_text:
04:34 See history come alive during a Living Wax Museum at Highlands Elementary School in Boise Pause

01:15 Boise Airport trains for disaster with mock airplane crash

00:43 The Grove Plaza in Boise under renovation

06:03 Listen as David Kearns, area director of OSHA's Boise office speaks to a large group of construction workers at a fall prevention training workshop held in the Grove Plaza.
